verses.verse: Περὶ <WG4012> Peri for ( Principles of Marriage) δὲ <WG1161> de Now ὧν <WG3739> hōn the matters ἐγράψατε <WG1125> egrapsate you wrote about : καλὸν <WG2570> kalon [It is] good ἀνθρώπῳ <WG444> anthrōpō vvv γυναικὸς <WG1135> gynaikos . . . . ( Literally It is good for a man not to touch a woman.) μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv ἅπτεσθαι <WG680> haptesthai to abstain from sexual relations
